desc: RecoveryPop is an innovative cryotherapy and cryomassage tool, which integrates an ergonomic handle to enhance deep tissue massage without the cold fingers that's usually associated with other ice massage techniques. The RecoveryPop is the perfect product to get you back to doing what you love!

layout.text: World's first reusable ice massage tool with a handle.
No more waste. No more frozen fingers. No more pain.
